description:
Laharl is son of King Krichevskoy, Overlord of the Netherworld, and a human female who had come to the Netherworld to study witchcraft, and is thus a half-demon and rightful heir to the throne. After discovering his father`s death, Laharl sets out to take back the throne and proclaim himself as the true Overlord of the Netherworld.
Laharl loathes love, kindness and optimistic thoughts, which is partially because of his mother`s death.
name: Laharl
